field.domain: self.isContact IS TRUE AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Partner part WHERE part.id = :partnerId AND self.id IN (SELECT id FROM part.contactPartnerSet))

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " self.projectTypeSelect = 1 AND self.clientPartner.id = ${partner?.id} AND self.isBusinessProject = true "

field.name: bankDetails
field.expr: eval: partner?.bankDetailsList.find{ it -> it.isDefault && it.active} ? partner?.bankDetailsList.find{ it -> it.isDefault && it.active} : null

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " self.id IN (${partner.bankDetailsList.collect{it.id}.join(',')}) AND self.active = true "
